text: Ratanaṃ vā pana bhikkhuniyā ratanasammataṃ vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitabbaṃ yassa bhavissati so harissatī ti ayaṃ tattha sāmīci
edit: Ratanaṃ vā pana bhikkhuniyā ratanasammataṃ vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitabbaṃ yassa bhavissati so harissatī ti ayaṃ tattha sāmīci

translations.transtext: But when a bhikkhunī has picked up or had (someone) pick up a valuable or what is considered a valuable (left) in a monastery or in a dwelling, she is to keep it, (thinking,) "Whoever it belongs to will (come and) fetch it." This is the proper course here.
